statements: DELETE FROM StockReports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01' AND stock_level < 100
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < (SELECT AVG(quantity) FROM stock_levels);
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 10 AND last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount <= 1000 AND sales_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM revenue WHERE total_revenue = 0 AND revenue_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM stock_levels WHERE quantity < 10 AND product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_amount < 100)
DELETE FROM sales_performance WHERE sales_date < '2022-01-01' OR sales_amount = 0
DELETE FROM SalesPerformance WHERE sale_id = 100 AND quantity_sold > 50;
